title: beef roulade
directions: spread 1/2 Tbsp mustard on each piece of meat
sprinkle onion, paprika, salt, pepper evenly over steaks
lay one piece of bacon on each steak
roll up steaks and secure with toothpicks
heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat and cook meat on all sides until browned
reduce heat to medium low and simmer until tender, about 30 minutes
remove meat rolls, strain liquid in frying pan and return liquid
whisk together cornstarch and 1 cup of warm water
slowly pour the slurry into the skillet stiring continually until the sauce has thickened, 2-3 minutes
return the steaks to the sauce and serve immediately
ingredients: 8 (4 oz) pieces round steak pounded 1/4 inch thick
